Comments_List: I learned how to evaluate economic growth in the short run and long run. I developed basic skills for using models and making predictions based on them.
basic macroeconomics and how it is relevant to the real world.
after the midterm, the class goes too fast and it is too loose before midterm

This course was very informative and engaging, but could be improved in terms of pacing. The first half of the course material was taught at a moderate pace, but the second half felt a bit rushed. I think that time should be more evenly divided between these two halves of the course material.
the first half of the course felt a lot easier and less rushed.
Yes. Great time and opportunity to learn something in summer.
Yes. It is a good course
Yes, I would recommend this course because it really encourages better understanding of our economy and what has happened in the recent financial crises.
Yes because you learn a lot in a very short amount of time.
